content.detailedDescription: I was taking pictures of myself and an american flag.  after i got home, i looked through the photos and saw an object in the sky.   i have no idea what it is.  possibly a drone.  i'm really curious and excited about it.
content.summary: I noticed the object in a photo i took.  it's a small object hovering above my head

content.detailedDescription:
on november 19 2015, i  took what i thought was the first picture on a phone i had got about a week earlier. i was surprised to see it was photo 51. i did not take these pictures. the reason i know the exact date and time is because the phone tells me the date and time  the pictures were taken.

on november 17th from 4:19pm to 4:33pm, my phone took 50 pictures.I don't know exactly how to explain this event. i did not witness it. i was asleep probably. i was in the hospital from november 3rd til november 12th. i suffer from chronic diseases as well as severe anxiety. 
the phone had nothing in it when i set it up. it is a samsung flip phone given threw a program for low income families. 

i cant explain these. i have tried my hardest to recreate them. i could only upload 10 so i picked the ones that stood out to me, but there are 40 more i have available as well as the original phone with the original pictures. im really curious about these. im an avid skywatcher. i've seen and recorded orbs but never in my wildest, weirdest dreams did i think i would be looking at this. they speak for themselves. i hope to get some feedback soon. thank you.
content.summary: 50 unexplained pictures, that i didnt take ,of ?? creatures?? on my cell phone

content.detailedDescription:
Estabamos con otros pescadores cerca del muelle del puerto de punta loyola que queda cerca de la ciudad de rio gallegos y vimos dos luces moverse muy rapido, ir y venir haciendo curvas cerradas en el aire.
primero estaban sobre los acantilados que estan en la costa de enfrente mas alla de la isla que se llama deseada, despues se movieron frente a las barrancas y se fueron al norte por las barrancas y despues volvieron y estuvieron dando vueltas, subian y bajaban.
despues subieron derecho para arriba y se fueron para el lado del sur de donde esta el barco encallado en la costa.
ademas de yo habia otros dos pescadores y tambien otra persona en la ruta grabando todo con un celular, despues hable con ese señor y vimos el video en el celular donde las luces salian claritas.
soy pescador hace años aca y solamente algunas veces vi luces dar vueltas pero nunca tan cerca del muelle ni de las casillas de los pescadores.
un amigo mio tambien pescador estaba unos kilometros llendo para el sur tambien pescando ese dia, esta semana lo internaron por presion alta y lo fui a visitar pero me dijo que no habia visto nada cuando estuvo ese dia pescando con la familia.
quisimos ir a denunciar todo a prefectura pero no habia nadie en la oficina en ese momento.
esta semana hable con otro de los pescadores y me dijo que habian estado unos señores preguntando por la luces y que hablaron con el señor que las filmo con el celular.
espero que no espantes a los pescados porque sino no vamos a poder pescar por en parte nosotros vivimos de la pesca ademas de hacer changas en la ciudad y las chacras.
content.summary: Vi dos luces de color azul intenso moviendose muy rapido sobre la desembocadura de la ria del rio gallegos .

primero estaban sobre los acantilados que estan en la costa de enfrente mas alla de la isla que se llama deseada, despues se movieron frente a las barrancas y se fueron al norte por las barrancas y despues volvieron y estuvieron dando vueltas, subian y bajaban.

content.detailedDescription: I was washing the windows and saw what i thought was birds flying and hovering. there were about five or six doing semicircles and up very high. i noticed some puffs of cloud nearby and saw that the objects were higher than the clouds. i said aloud to myself, how did they get so high? then they rapidly started flying in different directions, by now i could tell they were not birds and were probably too big to be any birds i've seen. two flew toward the sun till i couldn't see them no more and they were orbs that didn't change shape. the others flew in different directions, one descended and seemed to change to a cigar shape. it flew west to east and behind a small cloud then seemed gone. three minutes later another one appeared from the west going east. i got out the binoculars and watched it closer until it got to the same point in the sky, it appeared to be changing color then it was gone for only a few seconds then it was there again going the opposite way. it did seem to be coming toward me for a few moments but eventually disappeared behind some clouds in the west part of the sky without reappearing. when i thought it was coming toward me, i felt a little worried, but thought whatever happens, happens.
content.summary: Orbs flying off like birds, suddenly changed shape and direction, some disappeared, some wobbled and were gone.

content.detailedDescription: 02-25-2016 taking photos at old fort parker historic site 5.5mi north of groesbeck, texas, limestone county.  did not see object.  found it on frame #4070  4 days later when file was downloaded for processing.
content.summary: Object seen in photo only

content.detailedDescription:
i was a teen hanging with friends one summer night atfter dusk and it went over our heads at about 20 mph. i heard no sound but others may remember differently. it appeared triangular because it had three lights, one red round one in the front and two oval yellow ones in the rear. it was about 200ft in the air i believe it was black or something because i don't remember seeing stars through it. it came from the north above the power lines and higher than the trees but we didn't notice it until it was practically overhead(someone called out to look up)we all looked at it as it traveled south. it seemed to go right down the street. i decided to run home to get my camera, and sadly i could not find it. by the time i returned outside everyone was down the street and returning back towards me. i was told it continued over the niagara river out of sight. i lived near the usaf in niagara falls, where bell aerospace was located at. we all thought maybe it was government but i called the air force base and they claimed to know nothing. i kind of forgot about it or did not want to talk about it. now years later it has been bugging me. it was probably a secret balloon or something but i wanted to tell my story. i do not know where all the other witnesses are now and reluctant to give names. one last thing; it was so long ago i might have the wrong year.
     i also had a weird encounter in the summer of 2012 around midnight. i swear i saw a large dark feline run across the street as i drove down a street. it looked to be the size of a great-dane or bigger and it bounded past in like three jumps.
     if you contact me by e-mail i may respond. i am unsure how to handle this. i am uncomfortable with certain situations. maybe you get so many reports this may just be filed away! thank you.
content.summary: I was a teen hanging with friends one summer night atfter dusk and it went over our heads at about 20 mph. i heard no sound but others may remember differently.

content.detailedDescription: Large ball of bright white light passed just below of not in front of the bottom part of the moon at 5:30ish am on march 4,2016 on my way home from delivering news papers and from michigan looking south at the moon it passed from southeast to very low to southwest then vanished. at first i thought it was a planet since they have been close to the moon recently but then i noticed it kept moving so i told my husband to look and we both watched it descend at an angle and then disappear. we both agree it was not a plane or helicopter as it was much to close to the moon and how it just "vanished". it did not leave a visible trail to the naked it. we are both stumped as to what it could have been. at first i thought it might be the asteroid 2013 tx68 but that is not supposed to happen til tomorrow. march 5, 2016. i was thinking maybe small fragments before the bigger asteroid but whatever this was it was very large and very bright.... unfortunately it happened to fast to get out my phone to get a picture of while i was driving.
content.summary: Huge ball of light planet like or star like?

content.detailedDescription: A friend and i were just coming back from a hike at montana de oro state park. it was sunset and the wind was blowing pretty good and the stars were beginning to come out. we passed two men in these big long jackets,which i thought was odd for that time of year. we decided to get out of the wind by sitting in a little nook that was washed out from the rain inside the cliff so our heads were about ground level and the beach was down below the cliff. the 2 men kept drawing my attention by making something spark it seemed or a spark was coming from somewhere. then, after the 3rd spark or so the biggest, brightest light i've ever encountered flashed so big and it was in the shape of a cylinder. inside the cylinder of light was a small gray alien. i was shocked, frightened and yelled run!! all three of them saw us get up and run, we were about 200 ft away. we drove back in to san luis obispo and pulled in to a parking lot. i asked my friend to tell me what she saw and made her draw a picture as well. she drew the typical alien head with large eyes. i was still pretty shaken and at first i thought it was a small naked child and some ritual was about to take place but my friend is a pediatrician and exclaimed, "that was no child". i've tried to put this behind me because you just can't talk to anyone about this stuff.  i went back the next morning to see if i could try and make sense of it all but nothing.  i started listening to coast to coast years ago and it brought back the memory and so i called my friend and we have since discussed it. her story is a little different for she saw 3 glowing red rods hovering in or around the being. i've since had 2 more encounters. one craft siting last year in the same area along with another witness and right after the alien incident i had a small glowing little orb fall from my ceiling in my living room one evening. i've been wanting to tell this for so long.
content.summary: On an evening hike i witness 2 men then a flash of bright light and in the center of the light there was an alien being.

content.detailedDescription:
1. i was on my way from redmond to a dr appointment in bend
2. i happen to notice a strange object hovering in the sky as i was traveling and i pulled out the phone in hopes that i could capture this image to show my family what i saw
3. i had no clue what i was seeing, but it was a bit freaky i must admit
4. object appeared to stay stationary the entire time until it just disappeared without a trace
5. i was in shock and utter belief at what i witnessed hovering in the sky
6. it vanished into thin air with no trace
content.summary: Stationary object hovering in the sky

content.detailedDescription:
I often wake up at around 3 or 330 am. the first time i saw the light it was approx. half mile away. it was very bright and appeared round. i watched for about 4 minutes as it moved toward my house. it stopped about
75 to a 100 yards from my home and hovered about 15 seconds and vanished.
the following week it was about 330 am when i saw it again except this time it was about 100 yards from my home and about appox.500 feet off the high also a very bright white light that appeared round. this time it just hovered for about 2 mins, and again just vanished. like someone turning off a light switch. the object was about 20 feet across. the 3rd time is saw it was in early january. this time is was 4 am. the light was very bright and again appeared round and i could see the light reflecting off the ground. it was about 70 feet off the ground and 50 yards from my home i watched it at least 3 mins it then went straight up so fast my eyes couldn't focus on it.
the object looked to about 20 feet across, on all 3 occasions. there was no navigation lights that i could see. ive seen planes come in on a similar fight path before never with lights that bright and never that low or close the my house. and ive always been able to see navigation lights. i do live about 20 miles from kalamazoo airport. so planes are common before 12 midnight, i do believe they close at 1 am. on the third accasion my dogs woke up and started barking inside the house.
content.summary: Large bright light that appeared to move north to south. hover for a second and the dissappear.

content.detailedDescription:
I saw the lights from the offices route of coal deposits, then i went out to see them outside, were there for 40 minutes.

two other people saw one i filmed with his phone.

they moved very fast and had in electric blue.

i did not feel scared

the lights went south fast scrolling up and down.
content.summary: See two light electric blue moving over de clift at the north shore of the gallegos river mouth.

content.detailedDescription: I was flying kites with my father in garnett, kansas at the track. i took several consecutive photos, in two of the photos there is an orb that is clearly moving. i did not see the object until i went back and uploaded the photos to my computer several days later. in the photo there appeared to be a sphere orb moving east.
content.summary: Orbs photographed, which weren't seen until later while i was looking at the photos i took of my kite.

content.detailedDescription: Observed rectangular ufo with lights on each vertex and in center. a friend and i were sitting on the roof and talking usually when he observed the object. i randomly looked at the sky and located it hovering. it vanished suddenly after moving towards se direction.
content.summary: Observed rectangular ufo with lights on each vertex and in center

content.detailedDescription:
My wife and i were driving home west / northwest along riverwatch parkway.  we were admiring the sunset as we approached the i-20 interchange.  we noticed what appeared to be a plane's smoke trail way above traveling to the east / northeast, higher than we've ever seen before.  we then noticed movement below and to the left of the smoke trail about 3/4 of the distance between the horizon and the plane. it was a metallic spherical shaped craft highlighted by the setting sun. it was about the size of a bb if held at arm's length. we first thought it was another plane and that we were at an angle which only made it look spherical.  then, to our great surprise, the sphere quickly ascended but in an "s" pattern as if it were taking evasive maneuvers. it moved up right, then up left, then up right again and then finally it reached near the level of the plane's smoke trail, as if it were passing behind the plane.  what then shocked the both of us, was that the sphere accelerated upwards beyond the smoke trail and disappeared, as if it had flown out of the atmosphere. a few seconds afterward, the plane also disappeared and it's smoke trail evaporated quickly.  

as for the plane, we speculated that perhaps that had actually been an object re-entering the earth's atmosphere and creating an illusion of a smoke trail.  we knew that the american astronaut was to return from the space station later that evening, but this time seemed too early in the evening for that occurrence.  as for the metallic sphere, however, we have no explanation.
content.summary: Metallic sphere quickly rises in s pattern and then zooms out of atmosphere

content.detailedDescription: A ship triangular shows up every several days and is stationary. above the trees to the southeast. it is triangular white with  3 smaller blue lights around it. sometimes small blue lights come and go. has been observed for about 3 weeks. using old ww2 binoculars'.
content.summary: Triangualar ship white with three blue lights around sometimes smaller blue lights come and go

content.detailedDescription:
1. i was with my friend at palas mall iasi romania taking night photos of palas mall using my samsung s4 mobile phone.

2. i thought i saw a bright whitish shining object moving in a zig zag manner over my camera screen, so i decided to take a few more shots of the same spots. 

3. i thought it could be an ufo.

4. it moves over the camera screen in a zig zag manner at high speed and disappeared suddenly.

5. i am not sure what i saw was for real.

6. i don't know. all i knew was of the few photos taken of the same direction of the sky, only one of the photos have a blue disc with white light above the building.
content.summary: Pointed camera aimed and shots a few times, only one photo appeared with blue light

content.detailedDescription: I was on a plane just coming back from cape town. about an hour away from london gatwick airport. and all i did was take a photo out of the window. and didnt see anything until i looked at my cell phone. ..
content.summary: Three bright lights in the sky.

content.detailedDescription: Estoy en la azotea de mi casa, mirando el cielo porque estaba la atmósfera muy limpia y veo una luz de color naranja cruzar a mucha velocidad (7 u 8 veces la velocidad aparente de crucero de un avión de línea comercial) desde el sur de valencia hacia el noroeste, con una trayectoria rectilínea y a velocidad constante, sin dejar ningún tipo de estela y sin hacer ningún tipo de sonido o ruido. la luz naranja que desprende es constante y sin intermitencias.
content.summary: Luz brillante de color naranja cruza el cielo de sur a noroeste a grandisima velocidad

content.detailedDescription: This video was sent to me by a friend of mine who is aware that i investigate ufo sightings. i can attest that the video is genuine. it was shot by my friend's daughter, as they were on their deck at their cottage on lake athabasca, in northern alberta.
content.summary: Fireball orb over lake athabasca

content.detailedDescription: En la terraza de mi casa y observo esta luz naranja que cruza a gran velocidad de sur a norte con un movimiento rectilineo y constante, sin dejar rastro o estela a su paso y sin hacre ningun tipo de sonido. calculo que estarã­a a unos 8000 metros de altura, ya que aviones comerciales pasaban aparentemente por debajo.
content.summary: Luz naranja cruza el cielo valencia a gran velocidad de sur a norte

content.detailedDescription:
Me and my brother were walking towards our house. we stood on our back deck for a second, gazing up at the clear, starry sky, as we live where theres barely any light pollution. towards the western horizon, we saw what we first believed to be a star, but brighter; and moving ever so slightly back and forth in a circular motion; coming closer and farther with each small circular revolution. i headed into my house and grabbed a pair of high quality binoculars, and focused on the ufo. you could clearly observe red-orange lights, around 5~ i'd say, in a circle on the object, with a light blue aura barely, but clearly visible emitting from it. as we stood there astonished, we noticed multiple planes come close to the object, and each time one did, you'd notice the ufo pan towards and then, away from the clearly visible plane coming close to it. the planes were always small in scale to the bright, star-like object. 

it was then, when another plane passed under it, did i realize the extraterrestrial (out of this world) likeness of the object. the lights from the object reflected off the plane, making the wings visible, clearly meaning it was no starlight reflecting, and was instead artificial light. (out of this world) 

another 30 minutes went by, and need i tell you, it was around 15degreesf out, but i could not for the life of me take my eyes off this elusive ufo. it only ever went left and right, back and forward, appearing to be an eyetrick at first. but as i put my finger in front of it, it moved away from it, appearing again, and then suddenly to the left of it; indictating it's movements as something more than an illusion. 

i was and still am absolutely speechless, as i witnessed only one other paranormal incident in my life, when i was about 12-13. (i saw 10 simultaneous bright flashes, in the dead of night, so bright that the sky appeared to be blue, as if it was a mid-summer day, again with my brother) 
during the observing time, i felt sick and nauseous, as i know i saw the real thing when i was younger (i couldnt sleep that night, years and years ago, because i was so traumatized from the event) and i couldn't believe i could be so lucky as to witness yet another in my lifetime. the sickness though, had to be related to said unidentified object, each time i looked away, it would settle. but when i would gaze upon it, i felt as if my appendix burst all over again.
my brother recorded the event, but due to the distance of the object, and the quality of his phone and camera, you can just barely see the light and watch it move, but one might claim the video to be a hoax, so it's not worth sharing. the encounter however, was more than real than the sky is blue. 

the encounter ended as i got tired of watching it just move left and right, back and forth, with no further actions or indications it would 'fly' away. after two hours of gazing upon it, i walked back in my house, keeping in mind i'd go back outside and see if it either switched places (evidence of being a star, to me) or if it disappeared completely. a half hour went by and i stood outside to check, and in the sky, there was nothing. no bright lights/stars. no object, no more planes flying over that area. i can only imagine what i might have missed.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Bright red-orange star-like object which looked to be above atlantic city

content.detailedDescription: We were driving on rt 7 south right before the turn off for route m towards durock bay i saw off to my left above the tree line a extremely bright light. it appeared to be a large diamond shaped object. a ball of light appeared to separate from the object on the upper right hand side. both of the objects then vanished.The duration of the event lasted approximately 10-15 seconds.
content.summary: Bright white light diamond in shape appeared very large. a ball of light seemed to seperate from object and then the whole thing vanished.

content.detailedDescription:
Hello.
tell me what you think. so these photos where taken by my wife on oct-5 at 7:pm 2015. she was on her way home coming down a large hill driving slow about 40km, when she seen 3 glowing orbs that looked bright stars. she used her iphone 6 and snapped 2 shots but by this point only 1 orb was left. she reviewed  the photo with the orb in it, but the pic is not the best and she did not look at the second one until today. we noticed a disc like object floating above the orb. she did not see this when she was driving. it does not look like a bug or a reflection off the window to me. i like to have an open mind with these things. i just dont know what it could be. 

there are lots of people here that see things in the sky, but its a small town and nobody wants to sounds nuts, so for the most part they keep their  mouths shut. anyway thanks
content.summary: 3  bright orbs then 1 orb, with a disk shaped object hovering above it

content.detailedDescription: Sihanookville beach 28 fenuary @6.40-6.45  only one flight path over sihanookville that you ever see planes and thats running directly above and along the beach.     beach runs in a south east -north west direction   the sun had set below the horison , the sky above us was still light as there was only a  little cloud about . noticed what a asumed to be a plane maybe 100 metres away and about the same hieght thought it was strange that it was coming from overland and heading west ,but there was old patrol boats moored just offshore so thoufgt it was milatery,  the initial glimpse i got was what looked to me an old mirage fighter jet , with two bright green lights at the end of each wing , did not see any type of tail finns, just from 1 wing tip to the other was straight,thats the only structial glimpse i got coz i didnt realise at the time to get a better look,,it was out over the water so fast ,that i thought definatly milatery,,after seeing many f-16 and other jets in darwin it was easily there speed ,,,but no noise , f-16,s are very loud , this thing was nothing, only noise i could hear was the slight waves lapping at the shoreline , craft was well out over the bay when green lights turned red and it changed to a northerly direction , i asked the people sitting on the next table if they could see this as well ,he said he could .Couple on next table to him were ajso watching and pointing , craft headed north dor a few more seconds then turned west and gained altitude , then what looked like it droped altitude and went out of sight  whole experiance @15 seconds , no idea what it was  ,ps i dont know the degress so have put 45 in that box
content.summary: Thought was plane ,but was going to fast ,,so only got a glimpse when it was close

content.detailedDescription:
331 flora avenue.
it was about 12:00pm (afternoon). i was in grade 10; and since my older sister lived one blocked away from my school and she always bought me mcdonalds. i always went over to her house for lunch. but this time she was in a rush and we had to take over food to go, but i didn't care because i was hungry. but enough about mcdonalds, my sister was in a rush because she was meeting this "guy" her boyfriend or her secret crush, still not really sure about all that, but whatever. 

 when we got back to 331 flora avenue, after ordering from mcdonalds. it was about 12:20pm and the mcdonalds is only about a 3 minute drive from 331 flora. me, my sister and loki (who is only 1) went inside to put the food on the table, but of course my sister was in a rush to meet this dude that she rushed outside into the yard with loki in her arms....

 i unpacked all the food... but i didn't want to eat alone... so, i ran outside and i found my sister standing in the yard, looking up at the ski and loki, starred at me....I starred back at loki, and i walked towards him... but before, i could notice, he was also starring at the ski.

 then, it caught my eye. i saw it too. it was a huge ship in the ski! so big! it was shinny. as soon as i looked at it. ( i was somewhere else, i don't exactly know where, but i seen whiteness everywhere and 2 hallways and i heard loki crying so i followed it, but then i saw these 3 "things" and white cold tables with huge colorless things looking at me with huge eyes).

 but then, as soon as i knew it. i was back in the yard and my older sister screamed and pulled at my arm to get inside. i seen the fear in her eyes. so, i ran. when we went inside, we starred at each other for awhile and she told me " don't tell anyone about this, you understand this! they will think were crazy!". 

 that happened when i was 15, now i'm 20. this was the hardest secret to keep in.
content.summary: Shinny. bright. large. 3-d type. silver. huge. different. taller then a highrise

content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: Just left baseball practice, i was driving on the highway to my house. there were clouds up ahead as well as an overpass bridge, as i drove under the overpass bridge i noticed a very bright light at the corner of my windshield, it wall like the high beams on a vehicle but it wasn't in my rear view mirror. so i looked again and from the corner of my left eye i spotted another light. it was bright and out it came,  a huge triangle shaped object with lights at each end the size of a football field. it was moving like a floating piece of drift wood in choppy water but in slow motion. it slowly made its way back into the cloud. it was like something out of a movie! i then saw its bright light through the cloud then slowly fade, i then noticed some stars in the sky were blinking like beacons. i wasn't surprised just eccentric as this was the third time in my life iv seen something like this. the very next day i went into school (im a senior in highschool) i talked about it and almost every one in the class had something to say about how they know someone who saw it or they did. (10 people in my class) one class mate has a video of a fireball like  ufo and my teacher also has seen the fireball ufo i didn't but another classmate said a person posted of fb about exactly what i saw. a gigantic triangular object. the next night i saw the same triangle and fireballs that my teacher and classmates have seen also have filmed.
content.summary: Huge triangle, lights at each corner, seen at left of winsheild w/glance then spotted coming out of clouds at left and hoverd.

content.detailedDescription: On the night of january 16th at around 5:16 pm an entity dressed in blue (the items the entity was dressed in was a dark blue skin tight type suit materials are unknown with a dark red cape on it's back with an insignia) flew down from a height of 18-20 meters into carss park (a park located near my address shown above) it's features seemed human but had red glowing eyes like the thing was about to shoot beams but then it heard a noise presumably from me hiding in the bushes it looked my way and flew off which when it did sounded like a sonic boom jet-like noise.
content.summary: The entities features includes a human-looking male with blue covering and a red cape with an insignia

content.detailedDescription: I was driving from oberlin, oh to kent, oh. i took i-480 e. i typically drive this route as i have an internship in cleveland so i always look around the sky for planes flying into cleveland-hopkins airport. all was normal then a few miles past the airport i was driving minding my own business at this point..Something in the sky to my left caught my eye. i looked over and a glowing white orb zoomed in a straight line path before completely disappearing (going dark). i am a pilot and was well aware of the meteorological conditions (vmc). relatively clear sky, few clouds. this thing moved faster than any aircraft i have witnessed, especially at such a low altitude. winds were not much of a factor today so ground speed most likely did not play a factor. i also noticed only the white light, no nav lights whatsoever...I would estimate an altitude of somewhere between 4000-8000 feet. law requires 250 kts (ias) or less below 10,000 ft. this was no plane, i know them too well.
content.summary: Driving on i-480, something to my left caught my eye. looked over and large, solid white glowing orb dashed in straight line path and disappeared in blink of an eye.

content.detailedDescription:
There i was, right? with all me mates at school when suddenly i hears this massive buzz sound. i look to the sky, and sure enough, the aliens have finally come to abduct me. my very own extraterrestrial biological entity coming to get me in it's black triangle. a light at each corner of the triangle. now, i've been waiting for this day to come for years, so i didn't hesitate to communicate. 

i climbed the highest tree, and screamed to the aliens "i await your probing with open arms my dear friends! let this experience last forever! come for meeeee!"

and sure enough, the aliens came down. slowly ascending. a rushed to the triangle's side, and a group of greys came out. instantly, their bodies began to move in a jerky-like fashion. i was afraid at first that they were displaying signs of aggression, could they not see that i was welcoming them?

but no, as i kept watching, i realized that they were moving in sync, and to some kind of beat that i could not hear. i waited for a while, but then they seemed to slow, almost uncertain. i took this as an invitation to communicate, and immediately mirrored their beautiful dance ritual.

they seemed pleased by this, and cried and cheered in joy. 

we danced for so long that i lost track of time, my friends must have left by then, cowards. until one of the greys came up to me. he didn't move his mouth, but i could understand him. he told me about the majestic 12 and how they are taking away their dance.

i realized what i must do. i was the dance ambassador. it was my destiny to reach the majestic 12 and teach them the ways of the grey's dance. 

here's where you guys come in. see, i don't actually know how to come into contact with the majestic 12. if you guys can help me with that, that would be real swell. please, the fate of grey dance relies on it.

cheers mate.

signed, sophie.

ps: i should mention that this morning while i was at school, i heard the same buzzing out of the speakers during opening assembly. you can ask my school for proof.
content.summary: Grey aliens black triangle started dancing some ritual dance. must come into contact with majestic 12 to be the grey's dance ambassador.
